HotelElement.Name: Park Inn by Radisson Palace Southend-on-Sea

Description.Text: Park Inn by Radisson Palace, Southend-on-Sea is a modern 3-star hotel offering waterfront accommodation in the heart of Southend-on-Sea. Highlights include onsite dining, free Wi-Fi, a gym and an excellent location opposite Southend Pier. Southend-on-Sea is a pleasant seaside town boasting the world's longest pleasure pier. A major British tourist destination until the 1960s, the town has recently been the focus of commercial investment in the arts and entertainment sector. Nearby places of interest include Adventure Island, Sealife Adventure, Southend Pier and Museum and Southend Cliff Railway. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Southend-on-Sea destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with wrought iron faux balconies on the front. Facilities include a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 26sqm and decorated in a modern style with cool blue tones and light wood furniture. Some rooms have sea views. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a safe and flat-screen TV with pay-per-view movies. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. RGB Bar & Grill offers British and European dishes in a stylish dining room with a wood floor and floor-to-ceiling windows with views of the sea and pier. The contemporary bar is brightly coloured and boasts a relaxing and friendly atmosphere. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
